archimate:Principle.name: Identifier 2
archimate:Principle.documentation: A text string or other atomic data structure used to provide a base level of Identity for an Entity in a specific context. In Self-Sovereign Identity systems, Decentralized Identifiers (DIDs) are the standard Identifier. See Appendix A.
